Detailed Description

A custom Menu object which will generate the application menu based on a configuration XML file. \

 Parameters:
 * parent application
 * XML configuration file
 * icons directory path

It actually creates the Menu widgets

00087         """It actually creates the Menu widgets"""
00088         # first create the menu:
00089         for i in self.MenuTree: 
00090             self.menus[self.MenuTree.index(i)][0]=tkinter.Menu(self)

00093         # recursively add the rest of the menu widget in a similar structure with self.MenuTree
00094 
00095         def recursMenus(menuname):
00096             """recursive function to add the rest of the menu widget."""
00097             # menuname is a two items like [Tkinter.Menu_Instance, [cascade_members]]
00098            
00099             for j in menuname[1]:
00100                 if len(j) == 2: # simple item j[0] is the label of the menu item; j[1] - various options
00101                     
00102                     # consider the possibility of separators:
00103                     if j[0] == "Separator" and j[1][0][1] == "Separator":
00104                         menuname[0].add_separator()
00105                     else: 
00106                         # unpack the options and names (j[1]) into a dictionary like this: 
00107                         # {"name": strvalue, "callback": strvalue, "accelerator": strvalue, "icon":strvalue}   
00108                         attr={}
00109                         for i in j[1]: attr[i[0]]=i[1]
00110                         try:
00111                             self.img.append(ImageTk.PhotoImage(Image.open(os.path.join(self.iconspath, attr["icon"]))))
00112                             menuname[0].add_command(label=attr["name"], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image=self.img[-1], accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00113                         except:
00114                             menuname[0].add_command(label=attr["name"], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image="", self.master), accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00115                         del attr
00116                 else: # must be a MenuSubDir (j[2] contains the items in the MenuSubDir)
00117                     j[0]=tkinter.Menu(menuname[0])
00118                     # unpack the options and names (j[1]) into a dictionary like this: 
00119                     # {"name": strvalue, "callback": strvalue, "accelerator": strvalue, "icon":strvalue}   
00120                     attr={}
00121                     for i in j[1]: attr[i[0]]=i[1]    
00122                     try:        
00123                         self.img.append(ImageTk.PhotoImage(Image.open(os.path.join(self.iconspath, attr["icon"]))))  
00124                         menuname[0].add_cascade(label=attr["name"], menu=j[0], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image=self.img[-1], accelerator=attr["accelerator"])
00125                     except:
00126                         menuname[0].add_cascade(label=attr["name"], menu=j[0], compound=tkinter.LEFT, image="", accelerator=attr["accelerator"]) 
00127                     del attr  
00128                     recursMenus([j[0], j[2]])
00129  
00130         for i in self.menus: 
00131             recursMenus(i)
